text: Allaha tamra rasulake satya sbapna dekhiyechena. Allaha cahena to tomara abasya'i masajide harame prabesa karabe nirapade mastakamundita abasthaya ebam kesa kartita abasthaya. Tomara ka'uke bhaya karabe na. Atahpara tini janena ya tomara jana na. Echara'o tini diyechena tomaderake ekati asanna bijaya.
